messages.message: Hi @danny.lan please let me know when this is deployed (is there a way to check aihub version on the UX?
As of right now, I’ve just tried it out and it seems like it is still happening, let me know if i should be setting up some time to show you.

to check the ai hub version on an environment
1. open the browser console
2. type `context.launcher.about_info` and press enter
3. see `release_branch`
so you’re still seeing this issue on prod? @Gwen are you free to do a quick sync?

i opened Gwen’s project (https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/build/fa63cbf3-4873-4328-98ca-2a66b29ca0a2), but i don’t have a commercial account that has access to this project, so i can’t inspect the custom function through the UI :disappointed:

i can see that the validation rule is saved incorrectly though - this validation rule should have 3 input fields, not 1 input field

in contract, the UDF is saved correctly - see how the UDF has 3 args

so far, i haven’t been able to reproduce on preprod

both the UDF and the validation rule are always saved correctly in my attempts to reproduce so far :smiling_face_with_tear:

the logic (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/d362763/webserver/shared/src/js/webpacked/apps/src/aihub/pages/BuildApp/fieldEditor/customFunctionPane/CustomFunctionPane.tsx#L352) for saving the UDF and the validation rule makes sense to me, so i don’t see how this discrepancy could occur

maybe we refreshed the page before the validation rule was saved correctly, and now it’s always saved incorrectly?
This is in the SE workspace, it might be that you have to add yourself to the workspace maybe?
